arts.ttl: Barcelona, Liverpool Marvel Over PSG, Tottenham Target’s Three Standout Traits Ahead of Pursuit
arts.sum: With Randal Kolo Muani now at Juventus, Paris Saint-Germain is looking to sell the French striker permanently, either to Juventus or another interested club. arts.ttl: Ipswich Town Star Could Be £150M-Rated Replacement for Newcastle Amid Liverpool, PSG Interest
arts.sum: The winter transfer window has closed, and for now, Alexander Isak is staying with Newcastle United. While there wasn’t much speculation about a move in January, reports suggest several clubs, including PSG, could make another push this summer. arts.ttl: Ousmane Dembele Reaches Feat Lionel Messi Accomplished in 2016 With Barcelona
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain kept their unbeaten run in domestic play alive with a 3-1 victory over Olympique de Marseille in the latest edition of Le Classique. After a quiet opening 15 minutes, Ousmane Dembele opened the scoring in the 17th minute. arts.ttl: Aston Villa Warned What Makes PSG Dangerous After Eliminating Liverpool in Champions League
arts.sum: After edging Liverpool 2-1 last Tuesday night at Anfield, Paris Saint-Germain shift focus to another Premier League opponent, Aston Villa, with a spot in the semifinals on the line. PSG fought past Liverpool in a tense battle, ultimately needing a penalty shootout to advance. arts.ttl: PSG close in on title with 3-1 win over Marseille
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain took another big step towards the title with a 3-1 win over Marseille on Sunday to extend their lead at the top to 19 points.
